title: Boots of the spider
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|A novel pair of boots invented by a suitor of Arachne.}} [[File:Boots_of_the_spider.png]] '''''the +3 pair of boots of the spider''''' +3 [[boots]] Allows [[Jumping]]
Allows [[Cling]]ing
+50 [[Stealth]] ==Desirability== The '''boots of the spider''' are an excellent find, combining the stealth and jumping egos with unbeatably high defense and the ability to [[cling]] to [[wall]]s (essentially a permanent, nerfed form of [[flight]]). If you have feet and don't actively avoid getting into melee range, wear these. ==History== The boots of the spider were added in [[0.14]], and were removed in [[0.15]] along with the disappearance of [[cling]]ing.
